page.title: 06RELIGION IN CAUNTON
page.content: There is one church in Caunton, St Andrews Church of England built of stone in the year 1100. Canon William Snow,who is in charge of the church,is 71. He,as vicar of Caunton,has to do burials,weddings,christenings and Sunday services and sometimes special services.Not surprisingly he dosn't like burials.He became a vicar in 1939. He chose the church because he felt that was what God wanted him to do.He likes his job and has been vicar of other places. Canon Snow has been living at his present home in Caunton for seven years.
